resources.string: Can be done with a Barbell either in the front squat or back squat position. It is recommended that you try squats with lower weight to get your form down before you increase the weight.

-Preacher curls exercise your brachialis which is below your bicep this muscle helps with bending your elbow.

 -Preacher curls help force you into negative movement which really helps improve muscle growth as well as strength.

 -Preacher curls are a great way to keep you in a good form but are bound by the equipment needed to perform this exercise. Bicep curls can work just as well but it is necessary to keep a good form and avoid cheating while performing them.

Make sure to always have a spotter when you bench press. This is a dangerous exercise and you can cause serious injury if you are not careful.

 You can Bench Press in a wide or narrow grip.

 If you want to emphasize involvement of your chest and anterior deltoids, then choose wide grip.

 If you want to emphasize involvement of your arms and place less strain on your shoulders, choose a narrow grip.
